column1: MRI image size (256, 256, 1) of a human head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with coronal section. We carefully examine slice n°44 from the back of the skull. The following elements are present in the image: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 2626.1719 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3989.3555 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 185.8887 mm³, the temporal horn of left lateral ventricle of volume 1.3184 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 498.3398 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 2171.3379 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 154.2480 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 188.5254 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2580.0293 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4056.5918 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 259.7168 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 531.2988 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 2086.9629 mm³ and the right hippocampus of volume 56.6895 mm³.
